verses.text: Ix yak' owal heb' filisteo yet' heb' israel, ix el lemnaj heb' israel chi', te niwan heb' ix cham t'a lum witzal Gilboa.
Ix b'at heb' filisteo chi' t'a spatic winhaj Saúl yet' heb' winh yuninal: Aton winhaj Jonatán, winhaj Abinadab yet' winhaj Malquisúa. Ix miljicham heb' winh yuninal winh chi' yoxwanhil.
Ix ochwal heb' winh filisteo chi' t'a spatic winhaj Saúl chi', ix lajwi winh sjulan heb' winh.

Yuj chi' ix yal winh t'a winh ed'jinac syamk'ab' icha tik: Ik'k'eta k'een espada chi', tza tipanoch k'een t'ayin, yic wach' manhoc juntzanh ch'oc chonhab'il tik ol tzalaj in smilani, xchi winh. Palta a winh ed'jinac syamk'ab' winh chi', maj yal-laj sk'ol winh ix sk'ulej icha ix yal winh chi', yujto xiv winh. Yuj chi' a winh ix ik'ank'eta k'een yespada, ix syumanb'at nhojnaj sb'a winh t'a yib'anh snhi' k'een.
Ayic ix yilan winh ed'jinac syamk'ab' winh chi' to toxo ix cham winh, ix syumanpaxb'at nhojnaj sb'a winh t'a yib'anh snhi' k'een yespada chi', ix champax winh.
Icha chi' ix aj scham winhaj Saúl t'a jun k'u chi' yet' oxwanh heb' winh yuninal. Manhxo junok yinhtilal winh ix elcani.

Ayic ix yilan heb' israel cajan t'a jun ch'olan chi' to toxo ix el lemnaj heb' yetisraelal heb', toxo ix champax winhaj Saúl yet' heb' winh yuninal, yuj chi' ix yaktejcan schonhab' heb', ix b'at heb' elelal. Axo heb' filisteo ix k'ochcan cajan t'a juntzanh schonhab' heb' chi'.

Axo t'a junxo k'u, ix b'at heb' filisteo chi' spojek' tastac ay t'a heb' ix cham chi'. Ix yilan heb' to a winhaj Saúl yet' heb' winh yuninal chamnacxo heb' winh, teljab'kan sniwanil heb' winh t'a lum witzal Gilboa.

Ha spichul winhaj Saúl chi' yic owal ayochi, elanhchamel ix yik'el heb', ix xicanel sjolom winh heb'. Ix yik'anb'at heb'. Ix schecan heb' b'at alchaj t'a masanil yol smacb'en heb' yet' t'a sdiosal heb'.
Ix b'at yak'anoch syamk'ab' winhaj Saúl chi' heb' t'a stemplo jun sdiosal scuchan Dagón, ix yak'ank'e locan sjolom winh heb'.
Ayic ix yab'an heb' aj Jabes ay t'a yol yic Galaad tas ix yutej sniwanil winhaj Saúl heb' filisteo chi',

ix slajtian sb'a masanil heb' winh winak te tek'an. Ix b'at yik'ancot sniwanil winhaj Saúl chi' heb' yet' pax sniwanil heb' winh yuninal winh, ix k'och yuj heb' t'a Jabes chi'. Ha t'a yich jun te' ji ix smuc sniwanil heb' winh chi' heb'. Uque' k'ual ix och heb' t'a tzek'ojk'olal yuj cusk'olal.

Icha chi' ix aj scham winhaj Saúl yuj chukal ix sk'ulej, yujto maj sk'anab'ajej schecnab'il Jehová winh, yujto ix sk'anb'ej pax sb'a winh t'a jun ix sk'uman spixan heb' chamnac, manhoc t'a Jehová ix sk'anb'ej sb'a winh.
Yuj chi' ix cham winh yuj Jehová, haxo t'a winhaj Dawid yuninal winhaj Isaí ix ak'jican yopisio winh chi'.
